sk1.name: Fissure
sk1.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line. Creates an impassable ridge of stone.

sk2.name: Enchant Totem
sk2.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

sk3.name: Aftershock
sk3.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

sk4.name: Echo Slam
sk4.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
